Small & Medium BusinessesAccountancy Practices

What is Cascade50?

Cascade50 transforms your Sage 50 data into insightful, vibrant and easy-to-use dashboards.

Gain an insightful and vibrant view of your business with an extensive library of intuitive and easy-to-use dashboards that cover everything from sales to finance and purchasing.

Small & Medium BusinessesAccountancy Practices

Why We're Different

Plug n Play

Instantly connect to an extensive library of vibrant pre-made dashboards.

Instant Access

Cloud access to your data from across the globe.

Fast & Reliable

A quick and powerful platform.

Low Cost

The price of a mobile phone contract for your entire company.

Customisable

A custom dashboard service tailored to each business.

Simple

No training required. A platform designed for everyone.
